items.title: Goal hero leaks pre-match message that supercharged Celtic's German exploits
items.description: McCowan has revealed the message that inspired his side's historic win.

items.title: Out of Europe - now Celtic face critical fortnight
items.description: After exiting the Europa League, Celtic face a season-defining fortnight in the fight for the league and Scottish Cup.

items.title: Luke McCowan in defiant Celtic title roar as he claims 'no-one in Scotland touches us'
items.description: The midfielder fired Celtic to a morale-boosting win in Stuttgart and hopes to have forced his way into the plans for Sunday

items.title: O'Neill disagrees with 'real Celtic' poser after European exit
items.description: Martin O'Neill had a different view when asked about the 'real Celtic' following his side's win over Stuttgart.

items.title: Luke McCowan says that 'no team in the league' can touch Celtic at their best
items.description: Luke McCowan believes that no one in Scotland can live with Celtic when they are on their game, as the midfielder talked up his side’s chances of a crucial win at Ibrox this Sunday after his goal helped his side to an impressive victory in Stuttgart.

items.title: Martin O'Neill takes issue with 'real Celtic' claim as he bites back in passionate TV address
items.description: The Premiership champions are locked in a potential four-way fight for the title and bared their teeth in Stuttgart

items.title: Standout Celtic performer makes Old Firm declaration ahead of Ibrox clash
items.description: Celtic goalkeeper, Viljami Sinisalo, has expressed his eagerness to feature in the upcoming Old Firm derby.

items.title: Neil Lennon: Why Celtic can't replicate Bodo/Glimt
items.description: Former Celtic boss Neil Lennon has highlighted challenges in matching Bodo/Glimt's success.

items.title: Stuttgart 0 Celtic 1: Celts restore pride and confidence ahead of visit to Ibrox
items.description: Here are the talking points from the MHP Arena as Celtic exited the Europa League but restored some pride with a battling win over German side Stuttgart...

items.title: How every Celtic player performed vs Stuttgart in gutsy Europa League showing
items.description: Celtic faced Stuttgart at the MHP Arena in their Europa League second leg in Germany.

items.title: Willie Haughey reveals audacious Celtic plan to buy £10m shares and gift them to fans with legend fronting it
items.description: Haughey's astonishing announcement comes amid the backdrop of a fractured club which has been torn apart amid in-fighting

items.title: Willie Haughey to invest up to £10m in Celtic shares if fans back new startup
items.description: Willie Haughey has pledged to invest over £10million in Celtic shares - if backed by the club's supporters.

items.title: Lee Miller warns Celtic they should be worried about finishing fourth this season
items.description: The former Hearts striker says it’s great to see his old side topping the table ahead of the Old Firm.

items.title: O'Neill explains decision to pick Sinisalo for Celtic against Stuttgart

items.title: James McFadden surprised by O'Neill's call in Stuttgart vs Celtic game
items.description: James McFadden was surprised to see Celtic captain, Callum McGregor, start against Stuttgart.

items.title: Celtic hero casts doubt over managerial favourite's credentials amid speculation
items.description: Former Celtic defender and pundit Mjallby has expressed doubts over whether Motherwell manager Askou is ready for the Celtic job.

items.title: Celtic fans turn Stuttgart streets into sea of green and white
items.description: From the bustling squares to the local drinking holes, supporters gathered together before tonight's big game against Stuttgart

items.title: Early favourite directly responds to Celtic managerial links amid speculation
items.description: Motherwell boss Askou has addressed speculation linking him with a move to Celtic.

items.title: Jens Berthel Askou wants 'peace and quiet' as next Celtic manager links intensify for Motherwell boss
items.description: Fir Park boss addresses question on Celtic link
items.mediaText: Jens Berthel Askou has earned rave reviews for his work at Motherwell and is currently the favourite to be the next Celtic manager. -  (SNS Group)

items.title: Celtic confirmed starting XI vs Stuttgart: 8 changes from Hibs heartache as criticised star taken out of firing line
items.description: Martin O’Neill has named his Celtic starting line-up to face Bundesliga side VfB Stuttgart in their Europa League knockout play-off second leg in Germany
items.mediaText: Celtic manager Martin O'Neill during the 4-1 defeat by VFB Stuttgart at Celtic Park. (Photo by Paul Devlin / SNS Group) -  (SNS Group)

items.title: Martin O'Neill names Celtic XI to face Stuttgart, makes eight changes
items.description: O'Neill has named his Celtic starting line-up to face Stuttgart in the Europa League.
